metadata.title: CVE-2023-3422 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Guest View in Google Chrome prior to 114.0.5735.198allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionto potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromiumsecurity severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
